Pre-Game Insights: The Cincinnati Reds have lost three games in a row.
The Chicago Cubs have alternated wins and losses over their last six games.
Nick Martinez has allowed one earned run or fewer in four straight starts.
Jameson Taillon has allowed two earned runs or fewer in four straight starts.
